entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • String splitter incorrectly handles multi-caret scenarios #64812
  • Sunset restricted types #64811
  • Change signature does change signatures that are not referencing the method on with the signature was changed #64809
  • newintegrationtests.csharp.csharpaddmissingreference.verifyavailablecodeactions (vs2022) #64807
  • Ref fields tests should target latest language version #64800
    17.5
  • Async taggers must override equality checks when comparing tags. #64797
  • When activating the sorting functionality, the rows under the column are not getting sorted according to the state of column header. #64794
    17.5
  • Refactoring (Extract Interface) - Allow inclusion of Doc Comments #64793
    Backlog
  • VB.NET `Convert If to Select Case` code fix bug #64787
    Backlog

Closed

  • Generate method intellisense don't generate "in" keyword in parameter(s) correctly #54212
    Backlog
  • Question: How to use syntax trees efficiently. #61797
    17.4
  • Test plan for RelaxingShiftOperator feature #60967
    17.4
  • Test plan for "required members" #57046
    17.4
  • Ref fields spec doesn't mention how scope flows from lambda to anonymous delegate types #64670
    17.5
  • SourceGenerator: A way to include files from a dependant project? #64753
    Backlog
  • Roslyn.VisualStudio.NewIntegrationTests.CSharp.CSharpSourceGenerators.InvokeNavigateToForGeneratedFile is Flaky #60477
    17.4
  • Convert to LINQ produces bad code when pattern matching is involved #64798
  • InvalidProgramException when attempting to instantiate generic type via implicit operator (and generic parameter is nullable value tuple) #64777
    17.5
  • Test plan for "numeric IntPtr" #60578
    17.4
  • Inaccurate error message when attempting to use a property as a `ref` #60807
    Backlog
  • False IDE0055 (Fix formatting) reported when using multiple TargetFrameworks #62612
    Backlog
  • Compiler/analyser disagreement on `byte[]` as an unmanaged type #64792
  • Recursive lambda reference crashes nullable analysis #64599
    17.5

PullRequests

Created

  • Semantic snippets - updates option names #64814
    Area-IDE
  • Stay on the UI thread if it's blocked waiting for us #64813
    Area-IDE
  • Move parts of official build onto new vm images #64805
    Area-Infrastructure
  • add telemetry log overload #64803
    Area-IDE
  • Implemen equality semantics for async tagger tags. #64802
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Read required project properties from evaluation data" #64801
    Area-IDE
  • Export correct type for VisualStudioWorkpacePartialSolutionsTestHook.cs #64799
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Ensure we include a projectId along with our ProjectChanged notifications #64808
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, OnDeckForQB
  • Snippets - turn feature off by default for 17.4 #64810
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForQB
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64806
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Additional tests for ref fields #64707
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • "Generate method" codefix supports 'in' parameters #64588
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Make `TargetFramework.NetCoreApp` use `Net70` #64791
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64796
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • VB: Align design around speculative semantic models with C#. #64751
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Unskip CSharpSoruceGenerators.InvokeNavigateToForGeneratedFile test #64626
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Do not treat `Nullable` null value as a constant for the purpose of IL generation. #64789
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64788
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Trigger background analyzer load when document open #64786
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add more symbol publishing packages to PublishData.json #64790
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #64758
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Clarify error message when attempting to ref a property #64764
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Don't format regions inside inactive conditionals #64551
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Extend test coverage for lambda default parameters #64530
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix nullable walker cycle #64600
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Improve SyntaxTree/Node.Dump() #62703
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix MSBuild tests and run them in CI again #64781
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Read required project properties from evaluation data #64749
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64816
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64815
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Use IAsyncEnumerable in DesignerAttributeScanning as well. #64616
    Area-IDE
  • Use ParsedDocument in more commmand handlers #63579
    Area-IDE
  • Track local constant usage in attributes applied to local methods or lambdas #64773
    Area-Compilers
  • Fixed nullable warning for "change cast type" refactoring #64080
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Use a more consistent pattern for updating the solution in a WOrkspace #64644
    Area-IDE
  • Disable Windows PDB conversion #64581
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #64757
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Inline Hints - Make sure hints aren't returned after code has been deleted #64341
    Area-IDE
  • Solution services cleanup #64160
    Area-IDE
  • TextLoader method override detection #64192
    Area-IDE
  • Fix VisualStudioMSBuildInstalled attribute #64131
    Area-IDE
  • Encoding serialization #64625
    Area-Compilers
  • Out arguments do not contribute val escape #64784
    Area-Compilers
